Override LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.oban.WeightedAverageOptimized.analyze ( PointObservations  data  )

00024                                                      {
00025         LatLonGrid grid = ObjectiveAnalysisUtils.createBoundingGrid(data, latres, lonres);
00026         double[][] sum = new double[grid.getNumLat()][grid.getNumLon()];
00027         double[][] sumwt = new double[grid.getNumLat()][grid.getNumLon()];
00028         int[][] numpts = new int[grid.getNumLat()][grid.getNumLon()];
00029         PointObservations.ObservationPoint[] points = data.getPoints();
00030         
00031         final int half_rows = wtKernel.length / 2;
00032         final int half_cols = wtKernel.length / 2;
00033         for (int k=0; k < points.length; ++k){
00034             final int row = grid.getRow(points[k]);
00035             final int col = grid.getCol(points[k]);
00036             if ( points[k].getValue() != data.getMissing() ){
00037                 for (int m=-half_rows; m <= half_rows; ++m){
00038                     for (int n=-half_cols; n <= half_cols; ++n){
00039                         final int i = row + m;
00040                         final int j = col + n;
00041                         final double wt = wtKernel[m+half_rows][n+half_rows];
00042                         if ( wt > 0 && grid.isValid(i, j)){ 
00043                             sum[i][j] += points[k].getValue() * wt;
00044                             sumwt[i][j] += wt;
00045                             numpts[i][j] ++;
00046                         }
00047                     }
00048                 }
00049             }
00050         }
00051         
00052         for (int i=0; i < grid.getNumLat(); ++i){
00053             for (int j=0; j < grid.getNumLon(); ++j){
00054                 if ( numpts[i][j] >= minPoints ){
00055                     grid.setValue(i, j, (int) Math.round(sum[i][j]/sumwt[i][j]));
00056                 } else {
00057                     grid.setValue(i, j, grid.getMissing());
00058                 }
00059             }
00060         }
00061         return grid;
00062     }
